title: To everyone complaining abotu the balance of edge of night.
body:
maybe it would seem more balanced if you actually played around it correctly.

yes the item makes you need to rethink how you play, that is A-Ok, plenty of items do that, banshees has practically the same effect, warmogs makes you need to go harder after every fight, zhonya's makes you need to either conserve burst or kill target while they are cced. 

Now stop blowing your only cc into a target with a spell shield, and start popping the shield and then peeling. good job, you can now deal with someone with a spell shield.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=magewick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zcVPMnv0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-12T17:46:15.642+0000)
>
> The fact that no one complains about banshee veil should prove to you that no one has problems playing around a balanced spell shield, 

PFFT . As if.  The reason no one complains about Banshees veil is because no one buys the thing after it got nerfed.
Guess why it got nerf'd?

I play lulu support and Orianna Mid a butt-ton.

Legit just Q/E before using your Polymorph or Q - W - Shockwave as Orianna.

I almost feel bad about it because its like their spellshield doesn't even do anything.
Yeah this. This is why most smart edge users try to jump on someone from out of vision, hoping their target panics and blows their CC spell out of reflex.

The issue is that people building it jump onto you and kill you in under a second you dont have time to use an ability and pop the spellshield and then land the cc. You have to be able to INSTANTLY peel them with perfect reflex or they will 1 shot you... So no this item isn't balanced in the sense that the uptime makes it very hard to find windows. IT needs a higher cooldown and then im totally fine with it as a mechanic in the game... but it shouldnt be up constantly. So sorry to burst your little bubble. The item is going to get nerfed seeing as the majority of player base agree its busted. I have a thread on it and I have 55 upvotes in counting... you have none. The only people that support Edge of Night are people that main champions that abuse it.

I play tanks and I have no trouble with it. the thing that needs nerfed is damage, not edge specifically, and htey are nerfing that. 

and when has riot ever done anything because of the community.
